resources.string: The goal of the game is to dodge the grenades. The player character (the smiley face) is controlled by touch/mouse input. Pressing down or clicking will begin the game, and colliding with a grenade or lifting the mouse/touch input will end it. A grenade will spawn every 5 seconds at the top left of the screen with a random velocity, and will remain bouncing around the screen until the game is over.
